title: LoK revenue share program 2.0
body:
Proposal to replace the current LoK p2e program with this one: 

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WfPH4rhTwMj934n8lXyfyyVoO2XJSocgDOOoQxSe8DM/edit?usp=sharing


Main change:  PayDay shares are solely determined by contribution to land development  (i.e., the more a player contributes relative to others, the bigger his payment).
author: 0x848FF2a5179C96167B271673f7bb6597233F5F9e
